service.title: Service
service.text: They live in beds, upholstered furniture, textiles, under door frames and window frames. They feed on the blood of humans and warm-blooded animals. Causes allergies and severe psychological discomfort.
service.text2: They carry pathogens. They live in cracks, under the mattress, behind the furniture, under the bathroom, under the cabinets, etc. They feed on food, household waste, leather goods and paper
service.text3: Heat-loving creatures that feed on insects and arachnids. They can live in barns and houses, but most often they are found in wooden buildings.
service.sectionText: Many people have trusted us for many years

titles.title: How is the transmission of pests carried out?
titles.text: With the help of special equipment, insecticides turn into an aerosol mist and penetrate into the smallest gaps between wallpaper, walls and floorboards, potential hiding places for invisible insects.
titles.title1: Are the drugs you use dangerous?
titles.text1: Medicines are not dangerous for people, pets and plants. But after treatment, the room should be ventilated for 40 minutes.
titles.title2: Do I need some way to prepare my home for treatment?
titles.text2: Mainly you need to isolate dishes and personal hygiene products. Pets should also be isolated during treatment. No need to move furniture or appliances.
